name: Akamai Technologies
summary: Bot Manager relies on the simple premise that not all bots are created equal. Many bots play a legitimate role in online business strategy. Others harm businesses by reducing competitive advantage, getting between an organization and its customers, or committing fraud. Bot Manager provides a flexible framework to manage the wide array of bots accessing websites every day.
details: Bot Manager relies on the simple premise that not all bots are created equal. Many bots play a legitimate role in online business strategy. Others harm businesses by reducing competitive advantage, getting between an organization and its customers, or committing fraud. Bot Manager provides a flexible framework to manage the wide array of bots accessing websites every day.

name: API.AI
summary: Api.ai provides developers and companies with the advanced tools they need to build voice interfaces for apps and hardware devices. The Api.ai platform lets developers seamlessly integrate intelligent voice command systems into their products to create consumer-friendly voice-enabled user interfaces. Api.ai is also the company behind Assistant, a first of its kind conversational assistant app crea
details: Api.ai provides developers and companies with the advanced tools they need to build voice interfaces for apps and hardware devices. The Api.ai platform lets developers seamlessly integrate intelligent voice command systems into their products to create consumer-friendly voice-enabled user interfaces. Api.ai is also the company behind Assistant, a first of its kind conversational assistant app created in 2010 that now has more than 20 million users and is the highest rated assistant app available. The Api.ai team and board of advisors brings decades of experience in artificial intelligence, machine learning and human-computer interaction services.

name: Beep Boop
summary: Beep Boop is a ridiculously simple hosting platform for your Slack bots. A hosting platform for Slack bots with turnkey build and deployments. Your Bots source code is managed through Github and launched as a container, so whatever language you prefer is A-OK.
details: Beep Boop is a ridiculously simple hosting platform for your Slack bots. A hosting platform for Slack bots with turnkey build and deployments. Your Bots source code is managed through Github and launched as a container, so whatever language you prefer is A-OK.

name: Chatfuel
summary: Chatfuel helps easily create chatbots to engage with your audience on messengers
details: Chatfuel helps easily create chatbots to engage with your audience on messengers

name: Confetti
summary: A very serious news service. Slack and Confetti make a great pair. Add to your channel and get updates there. Usually itu2019s news and mostly smart stuff. Sometimes itu2019s random but funny enough.
details: A very serious news service. Slack and Confetti make a great pair. Add to your channel and get updates there. Usually itu2019s news and mostly smart stuff. Sometimes itu2019s random but funny enough.

name: Converse
summary: Automated social media handling using bots. Unlike existing messaging platforms, Converse is focussed around enabling end user to service conversations. These may be to a computer/bot, a human, or a combination of both.
details: Automated social media handling using bots. Unlike existing messaging platforms, Converse is focussed around enabling end user to service conversations. These may be to a computer/bot, a human, or a combination of both.

name: Pandorabots
summary: Pandorabots is a web service for building and deploying chatbots. The Pandorabots Playground is a free, integrated development environment for building chatbots loaded with features and tools. Learn the basics of chatbot development in minutes, or hone your skills with our Tutorial.
details: Pandorabots is a web service for building and deploying chatbots. The Pandorabots Playground is a free, integrated development environment for building chatbots loaded with features and tools. Learn the basics of chatbot development in minutes, or hone your skills with our Tutorial.

name: Telegram
summary: Telegram is about freedom and openness u2013 our code is open for everyone, as is our API. Today weu2019re making another step towards openness by launching a Bot API and platform for third-party developers to create bots. Bots are simply Telegram accounts operated by software u2013 not people u2013 and theyll often have AI features. They can do anything u2013 teach, play, search, broadcast, remin
details: Telegram is about freedom and openness u2013 our code is open for everyone, as is our API. Today weu2019re making another step towards openness by launching a Bot API and platform for third-party developers to create bots. Bots are simply Telegram accounts operated by software u2013 not people u2013 and theyll often have AI features. They can do anything u2013 teach, play, search, broadcast, remind, connect, integrate with other services, or even pass commands to the Internet of Things.

name: Twitch Bot Directory
summary: twitchbots.info is a service that tries to collect all moderator and other serivce bots used in chats on Twitch. It is ran independently and developed as a hobby project.
details: twitchbots.info is a service that tries to collect all moderator and other serivce bots used in chats on Twitch. It is ran independently and developed as a hobby project.

name: WealthBot
summary: Wealthbot.io is an open source wealth management platform that reduces the cost barriers for Investment Advisors (RIAs) associated with serving the mass affluent. The technology for your investment advisor business. Wealthbot is a portfolio management platform thats extensible, customizable and 100% owned by you.
